column4: May be an odd question for this channel, but I honestly like unity, and I don't understand why it gets such a bad reputation. 12.04 is the first time I've used it however, was it really bad in 11.10? Have I just not run into it's problems yet? I'm honestly curious.
you are one of the lot without problems, congrat! ( *me too)
you can try ubuntu + gnome-shell too
